Stacey Abrams says 'Defund The Police' movement creates 'a false choice idea' Former Georgia gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams pushed back Sunday on calls to defund police departments across the country –calling it “a false choice idea” and arguing that reforming police departments is the best path forward.

Clyburn says 'nobody is going to defund the police,' calls for 'reimagining' of law enforcement Rep. Jim Clyburn, D-S.C., made it clear on Sunday that despite the public rancor following the recent police shootings of African-Americans, Congress will make moves to defund police departments.
What will 2020 elections be about? Impeachment, pandemic, George Floyd death by June leaves door wide open It’s only mid-June. And we don’t really know what may define the November elections.
